name: 12 Days of Treasured Collections Christmas Sale
description:
We are in the holiday spirit and we want to celebrate for 12 days long!

To take advantage of this 12 Day Sale orders will be taken by:

email budgetbundles@gmail.com
or
phone 901-244-0969

Simply provide your order to the sales representatvie via phone or email and in return

-if sent by email you will receive an invoice which is to be paid THE SAME DAY in order for you to receive the assign day's deal.
-if order is place by phone the transaction can be conducted over the phone.
Happy Holidays from Trice!

name: Unwrap a Peruvian Bundle Package
description:
100% Pure Virgin Peruvian Hair for sew-in weaves.

Color: Natural Brown which is equal to a 1B


Processing and Shipping Time is 7-10 Business Days
All orders are FINAL

THESE PACKAGES CAN NOT BE BROKEN! They must stay in their consecutive order !

name: Virgin Brazilian Straight
description:
100% Pure Virgin Brazilian Hair for sew-in weaves. This hair is in its pure and natural state, no chemical processing or coloring. This hair is very durable, minimal to no shedding, and tangle-free. With proper maintenance it will be long lasting and reusable. Hair can be curled, flat ironed, colored and permed just like your own hair.

Color: Natural Brown which is equal to a 1B

One Bundle=3.5 ounces
Suggested that you order 3 bundles for lengths 12-24 inches and 4 bundles for lengths longer than 24 inches a full install!

Processing and Shipping Time is 7-10 Business Days.

name: Treasure Apparel
description:
We have the caps and tees to get you through a bad day or just a day of being simple!

Our tee is the official Treasured Collections by Trice logo shirt. It is currently offered in Black and White relaxed fit shirt.

Our skull caps come in black. Rather you're "In Between Weaves", having a "Bad Hair Day", asking those staring at you "Got Inches?", or simply want to let everyone know who your hair provider is!

name: Treasured Wigs
description:
A 3/4th U or L part wig gives you the benefits of a sew in without the excessive tension on your scalp. It increases the longevity of your hair by preventing you from having to cut your wefts and makes it easier for you to get a full Glam look in half of the time. Never sit through a sew in again all that you'll have to do now is clip on or sew on your wig and your done.

How does it work? All you have to do is part your leave out provide base braids for the wig to clip into or sew onto position it on your head and blend your leave out to your wig.Parts can be in the middle, off center (right/ left) and deep side (left/right)

Wig materials are 3 times reinforced to insure their longevity. they are all hand sewn, bonding may be added for more security.

To complete your order: email budgetbundles@gmail.com with with the texture, patten, and rather you would like a U or L Part wig.


By completing this purchase, the customer acknowledges and understands the following and agrees to the terms:

name: Express Orders
description:
Express Shipping $30: Express shipping is for orders that are to be shipped 1-4 days AFTER order date 

THIS SHIPPING IS NOT CONSIDERED OVERNIGHT

This is recommended for customers whom are in need of their order pretty fast. You must express interest by contacting us at budgetbundles@gmail.com. 

We CAN NOT at this time estimate the arrival date of your order until the order is placed. If you having a hair emergency, please contact Treasured Collections at budgetbundles@gmail.com and we will have all intentions to fulfill your need in once again a quick but efficient manner as possible.

name: Shipping Insurance
description: This insurance will require someone to sign for your package when it arrives. It also covers the cost if the package is not successfully delievered. It is HIGHLY recommended you purchase this insurance especially during the holiday seasons.If an insured item is lost or damaged, the Postal Service will reimburse you for the repair costs or the value of the article at the time of mailing, up to the amount of insurance you purchased.

name: Treasure Maintenance Box
description:
Want to know the best products to care for your treasures.... We are an One Stop Shop! 

Organix Hair Collection or Herbal Essence are our highly recommended products for your treasures, save a trip to the store... We got you boo! 

Treasure Boxes include : 1 Bottle of Organix Shampoo and Conditioner or 1 Bottle of Herbal Essence Shampoo and Conditioner  and a Bottle of Weft Sealer.

Deluxe Treasure Boxes include: 1 Bottle of Organix Shampoo and Conditioner or 1 Bottle of Herbal Essence Shampoo and Conditioner,a Bottle of Weft Sealer, and 2 Packs of Flexi Rods.

Processing and Shipping Time is 7-10 Business Days
All orders are FINAL.

name: Weft Insurance
description:
Insure your treasures with weft sealer. Sealing your wefts with sealer prevents and decreases shedding and gives your treasures a durable foundation for installments. 

To seal wefts/tracks of hair to prevent shedding: Apply a thin coat of sealer to the track of hair along the thread/track. Allow product to dry, coat both sides of weft. Apply a second coat of sealant. Product dries quickly.

We can insure your treasures prior to your delivery 

 or 

You could receive your own insurance seal them yourself!


By completing this purchase, the customer acknowledges and understands the following and agrees to the terms:

name: Enhance your Treasure
description:
Enhance your treasures with our coloring services.

You may enhance your treasures with highlights,ombre, or even coloring your full bundles to your desired look.

Ombre- color goes lighters from roots to ends; ends of the hair is colored

Highlights- color applied throughout bundle of hair; parts of the bundle is colored

Custom Coloring- color indicated by customer to match their personal hair color; entire bundle of hair is colored


Please understand that these services can not take place until the order has arrived to Treasured Collections. Please understand that there will be a delay in your delivery which allows us time to complete these services. Please purchase with this time in mind.

We ask that indicate the color you wish to achieve in an email in our contact box and include picture if applicable.
